title: Add address
description: Add an address to the address list

title: Add addresses
description: Add multiple addresses to the address list

title: Remove address
description: Remove an address from the address list

title: Claim
description: Transfers the given token to the auction winner's address once the auction is over.

title: Place bid
description: Places a bid on the current auction for the given token_id. The previous largest bid gets automatically sent back to the bidder when they are outbid.

title: Send
description: Divides any attached funds to the message amongst the recipients list.

title: Update lock
description: Used to lock/unlock the contract allowing the config to be updated.

title: Update recipients
description: Update the recipients list. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.

title: Claim refund
description: Allow a user to claim their own refund if the minimum number of tokens are not sold.

title: End sale
description: Ends the ongoing sale by completing `limit` number of operations depending on if the minimum number of tokens was sold.

title: Crowdfund Mint
description: Mints a new token to be sold in a future sale. The message fields are defined and sent to the corresponding token contract defined as the token_address in the instantiation to mint. We use a vector of MintMsg to facilitate bulk minting for projects.

title: Purchase by token id
description: Purchases the token with the given id.

title: Purchase
description: Purchases tokens based on the specified limit or amount of funds sent.

title: Start Sale
description: Starts the sale if one is not already ongoing.

title: Burn from
description: Only with "approval" extension. Destroys tokens forever

title: Burn
description: Burn is a base message to destroy tokens forever

title: Decrease allowance
description: Only with "approval" extension. Lowers the spender's access of tokens from the owner's (env.sender) account by amount. If expires is Some(), overwrites current allowance expiration with this one.

title: Increase allowance
description: Only with "approval" extension. Allows spender to access an additional amount tokens from the owner's (env.sender) account. If expires is Some(), overwrites current allowance expiration with this one.

title: Mint
description: Only with the "mintable" extension. If authorized, creates amount new tokens and adds to the recipient balance.

title: Send from
description: Only with "approval" extension. Sends amount tokens from owner -> contract if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

title: Send
description: Send is a base message to transfer tokens to a contract and trigger an action on the receiving contract.

title: Transfer from
description: Only with "approval" extension. Transfers amount tokens from owner -> recipient if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

title: Transfer
description: Transfer is a base message to move tokens to another account without triggering actions

title: Update marketing
description: Only with the "marketing" extension. If authorized, updates marketing metadata. Setting None/null for any of these will leave it unchanged. Setting Some("") will clear this field on the contract storage

title: Upload logo
description: If set as the "marketing" role on the contract, upload a new URL, SVG, or PNG for the token

title: Cancel sale
description: Cancels an ongoing sale

title: Purchase
description: Purchases tokens with native funds

title: Receive
description: Receive for CW20 tokens, used for purchasing and starting sales

title: Add reward token
description: Add `reward_token` as another reward token. Owner only.

title: Claim rewards
description: Claims any outstanding rewards from the addtional reward tokens.

title: Unstake Tokens
description: Unstakes the specified amount of assets, or all if not specified. The user's pending rewards and indexes are updated for each additional reward token.

title: Update global indexes
description: Updates the global reward index for the specified reward tokens or all of the specified ones if None. Funds may be sent along with this.

title: Approve all
description: Approves an address for all tokens owned by the sender

title: Approve
description: Allows operator to transfer / send the token from the owner's account. If expiration is set, then this allowance has a time/height limit

title: Archive
description: Archives a token, causing it to be immutable but readable

title: Batch Mint
description: Mint multiple tokens at a time

title: Burn
description: Burns a token, removing all data related to it. The ID of the token is still reserved.

title: Mint
description: Mints a token

title: Revoke all
description: Remove previously granted ApproveAll permission

title: Revoke
description: Remove previously granted Approval

title: Send nft
description: Sends a token to another contract

title: Transfer agreement
description: Assigns a `TransferAgreement` for a token

title: Transfer nft
description: Transfers ownership of a token

title: Accept bid
description: Restricted to Cw721 contract.

title: Claim
description: Sends back the NFT to its original owner alongside the accrued rewards

title: Unstake
description: Assigns reward, and saves the unbonding time for later claim.

title: Claim
description: Transfers the given token to the recipient once the time lock has expired.

title: Deposit
description:
Deposit funds to be used by the Andromeda economics module to pay for ADO fees.

An optional valid VFS path can be provided to deposit funds on behalf of another address.

title: Pay fee
description:
Pay a fee for the given action. The sender must be a valid ADO contract.

Fees are paid in the following fallthrough priority: 1. The balance of the ADO contract itself 2. The balance of the App contract for the ADO 3. The provided payee address

title: Withdraw cw20
description:
Withdraw CW20 funds from the Andromeda economics module.

If no amount is provided all funds are withdrawn for the given asset.

title: Withdraw
description:
Withdraw native funds from the Andromeda economics module.

If no amount is provided all funds are withdrawn for the given asset.

title: Set sale details
description: Sets price, max amount per wallet, and recipient

title: Switch status
description: Automatically switches to opposite status. True means buying is allowed and minting is halted. False means the opposite.

title: Claim
description: Transfers the given token to the recipient once the time lock has expired.

title: Amp receive
description: Receives an AMP Packet for relaying

title: Assign channels
description: Assigns a given channel to the given chain

title: Create
description: Creates an ADO with the given type and message

title: Recover
description: Recovers funds from failed IBC messages

title: Send
description: Constructs an AMPPkt with a given AMPMsg and sends it to the recipient

title: Upsert key address
description: Upserts a key address to the kernel, restricted to the owner of the kernel

title: Claim rewards
description: Facilitates reward claim after claims are enabled.

title: Deposit native
description: Function to deposit native fund in the contract in exchange for recieving a proportion of the TOKEN.

title: Enable claims
description: Called by the bootstrap contract when liquidity is added to the TOKEN-NATIVE Pool to enable TOKEN withdrawals by users.

title: Withdraw native
description: Function to withdraw native fund from the lockup position.

title: Withdraw proceeds
description: Called by the owner after the phase is over to withdraw all of the NATIVE token to the given recipient, or themselves if not specified.

title: Buy
description: Transfers NFT to buyer and sends funds to seller

title: Update sale
description: Updates the sale's price, demomination, and whitelist

title: Burn
description: Burn the remaining tokens after expire time (only owner)

title: Claim
description: Claim does not check if contract has enough funds, owner must ensure it.

title: Send amp message
description: Receives an AMPMsg, creates a new AMPPkt that contains the AMPMsg and sends it to the recipient

title: Delete value
description: If key is not specified the default key will be used.

title: Set value
description: If key is not specified the default key will be used.

title: Send
description: Divides any attached funds to the message amongst the recipients list.

title: Update lock
description: Used to lock/unlock the contract allowing the config to be updated.

title: Update recipients
description: Update the recipients list. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.

title: Edit receipt
description: Edit a receipt by ID. Only executable by the assigned `minter` address or a valid `operator`.

title: Store receipt
description: Mint a new receipt. Only executable by the assigned `minter` address. Generates a receipt ID.

title: Send
description: Divides any attached funds to the message amongst the recipients list.

title: Update Lock
description: Used to lock the contract for a certain period of time making it unmodifiable in any way.

title: Update Recipients
description: Updates the recipients of the splitter contract.

title: Send
description: INTERNAL MESSAGE. Sends swapped funds to the recipient.

title: Hold funds
description: Hold funds in Escrow

title: Release funds
description: Release funds all held in Escrow for the given recipient

title: Claim all
description: Claims tokens from all batches using a paginated approach. If `up_to_time` is specified then it will only claim up to a specific time, otherwise it it will claim to the most recent release.

title: Claim
description: Claim the number of batches specified starting from the beginning. If not specified then the max will be claimed.

title: Create batch
description: Creates a new batch

title: Delegate
description: Delegates the given amount of tokens, or all if not specified.

title: Redelegate
description: Redelegates the given amount of tokens, or all from the `from` validator to the `to` validator.

title: Undelegate
description: Undelegates the given amount of tokens, or all if not specified.

title: Vote
description: Votes on the specified proposal with the specified vote.

title: Withdraw rewards
description: Withdraws rewards from all delegations to the sender.

title: Add recipient
description: Add a single recipient to the recipient list. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.

title: Remove recipient
description: Remove a single recipient from the recipient list. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.

title: Send
description: Divides any attached funds to the message amongst the recipients list.

title: Update lock
description: Used to lock/unlock the contract allowing the config to be updated.

title: Update recipient weight
description: Update a specific recipient's weight. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.

title: Update recipients
description: Update the recipients list. Only executable by the contract owner when the contract is not locked.
